newsitem.title: USA: Fed expected to add reserves via 4-day system RPs.
newsitem.headline: Fed expected to add reserves via 4-day system RPs.

text.p: The Federal Reserve is likely to add temporary reserves to the banking system via four-day system repurchase agreements on Thursday, analysts said.

The settlement date on Friday for the Treasury's recent quarterly refunding should put upward pressure on the funds rate, they said. The three-, 10- and 30-year securities that the Treasury sold last week all settle on Friday, August 15.
Federal funds were trading at 5-9/16 percent, above the Fed's 5-1/2 percent target for the rate, in mid-morning activity.
